name: Swat Course 2.0
description:
The controls are W, A, D or forward, left and right key for moving forward, left and right. The space bar allows the player to jump.

The small box on the top left of the screen refers to the current speed level you are on. The box at the top of the screen shows your score.

The four lighting effects are green, yellow, orange and red. They indicate the difficulty of the obstacle the player is currently on with green being the easiest and red the hardest.
